education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science (BS Data Science)

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
experiences.details:
- Developed machine learning models to analyze and predict customer behavior, resulting in a 15% increase in sales.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, preprocess data, train models, and deploy solutions.
- Conducted A/B testing and model evaluation to measure performance and optimize algorithms.
- Created data pipelines for collecting, cleaning, and storing large datasets from various sources.
- Presented findings and recommendations to stakeholders, including executives and product managers.

experiences.title: Computer Vision Researcher
experiences.details:
Conducted research in computer vision algorithms for tasks such as object detection, image classification, and image segmentation.
Implemented deep learning models using frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to integrate computer vision solutions into real-world applications, such as autonomous vehicles or medical imaging systems.

experiences.title: Healthcare Data Scientist
experiences.details:
Analyzed healthcare data to derive insights and improve patient outcomes, operational efficiency, and cost-effectiveness.
Developed predictive models for disease diagnosis, patient risk stratification, and treatment recommendation.
Worked closely with healthcare professionals to understand domain-specific challenges and opportunities in leveraging data science.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer,
experiences.details:
Designed and developed full-stack web applications using modern technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.js or Angular.
Implemented RESTful APIs for backend services using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB or SQL databases.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience.
Conducted code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure high-quality, maintainable code.

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.details:
Built and maintained scalable and secure backend systems using server-side technologies such as Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), or Java (Spring Boot).
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for communication between frontend and backend systems.
Managed databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) and implemented data models, queries, and optimizations.
Implemented authentication, authorization, and security measures to protect against common web vulnerabilities.
